item.title: Mentioned by TheChronicleHerald.ca
item.description:
Homeless veterans need Ottawa's help — Stoffer
Nova Scotia MP Peter Stoffer is urging the Harper government to better address the needs of homeless veterans. The NDP's veterans affairs critic said Friday a centralized, well co-ordinated undertaking is what's needed from Ottawa. Stoffer pointed to a recent ...

item.title: Mentioned by Halifax News Net
item.description:
Sackville cemetery offering discounted plots to veterans
Bill Mont sat next to NDP MP Peter Stoffer, the official opposition critic for veteran's affairs, at a press conference on March 22 to discuss a recent announcement from Ottawa regarding a funding boost to the burial program for Canada's former soldiers.
